title: Travel MarketPlace Returning to Toronto
text:
Travel MarketPlace Returning to Toronto September 09, 2015 
For the third year, the Travel MarketPlace conference will be held in Toronto. The event will take place May 2 and 3, 2016, at the Sheraton Centre in the city’s downtown. 
“We were extremely pleased with the support from the industry for Travel MarketPlace last June. Our numbers have doubled year-over-year,” said Anne Marie Moebes, Executive Vice President, Travel MarketPlace. “Our goal for 2016 is to bring even more industry experts and suppliers to the conference so that we continue to meet the educational and networking needs of Canadian travel professionals.” The event will be held during Canada’s Travel Agent Week, which takes place the first week in May 2016. Last year , more than 300 supplier and travel professionals attended the conference, making it the largest Travel MarketPlace ever. Registration will open soon.
